name: bagpipes
description: Less code, more flow. Let's dance!

scripts.coverage: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/*
scripts.coveralls: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/* && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js --verbose

author: Scott Ganyo <sganyo@apigee.com>
